titleStmt.title: The tragedie of King Richard the second As it hath beene publikely acted by the right Honourable the Lorde Chamberlaine his Seruants.
King Richard II
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Valentine Simmes for Androw Wise, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules church yard at the signe of the Angel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules church yard at the signe of the Angel
